data.text:
Victor Salva Film Director, Pedophile, Writer, Producer, Rapist Gender: Male

Victor Salva is an American film director, writer and producer most know for his work on the films Jeepers Creepers film franchise. Salva is a controversial figure due to his molestation and conviction of a 12 year old actor from the movie Clownhouse 1988. He served only 15 months of a three year prison sentence.

Filmography
